parameters.name: Where
parameters.description: Where to split the table as defined in swTableSplitLocations_e

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the row or column as specified in Where to split the table (see Remarks )

title: ITableAnnotation.Split
description: Splits the table at the specified location.
signature:
TableAnnotation Split( 
   System.Int32
Where
,
   System.Int32
Index
)

parameters.name: Where
parameters.description: Where to split the table as defined in swTableSplitLocations_e

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the row or column as specified in Where to split the table (see Remarks )

remarks:
The index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
The indexes for the rows and columns always correspond to the rows and columns of the table from which the split table originates.
